QuestData.Title: The Warsong Threat
QuestData.Description: <The attack plans are scrawled onto the parchment in thick, black ink and bound in rough leather.>$b$bTo all outrider stations:$b$bThe warlord has commanded that all outriders prepare for a full assault upon the Alliance invaders in our land. Plans for the attack have been delivered to several of the remote outrider posts.$b$bBlood and glory shall be ours as we trample the Alliance invaders beneath our feet!$b$bThe warlord commands and the Warsong obey! Lok'tar ogar!
QuestData.CompletionText: What do you have for me?
QuestData.RewardText: <Captain Washburn examines the attack plans, squinting at the lettering and holding the pages upside down.>$b$bHmm... I see... yes... indeed!$b$bThese are obviously attack plans, as you yourself have stated, but they are most likely written by kobold pyromancers.$b$bStrange though, I haven't seen any kobold pyromancers since my days in Azeroth. No matter! I assure you that the outpost is well armed and mostly fireproof!$b$bIf we are attacked, the outpost shan't fall. You have my word, commander!
